name: @creditkarma/feature-flags
description: A dynamic feature flags library for Node.js

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.pretest: npm run docker:kill && npm run build && npm run copy-test-config
scripts.test:integration: wait-on --timeout 20000 http://localhost:8510 && node dist/tests/integration/bootstrap.js && CONSUL_ADDRESS='http://localhost:8510' CONSUL_DC='dc1' CONFIG_PATH='dist/tests/integration/config' lab --timeout 15000 --verbose -l -S -P spec dist/tests/integration
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:publish

author: Credit Karma
